text: The integration of artificial intelligence (AI) with emotional intelligence (EI) is gaining traction in various sectors, including education. This chapter explores how AI systems can be leveraged to enhance emotional understanding and support in educational settings across Latin America and the Caribbean. Utilizing methodologies such as facial recognition and software-based analysis, researchers have delved into the intricate relationship between AI capabilities and emotional responses among students at the university level. While this systematic review provides insights into current research trends, there is a need to further expand this exploration into other disciplines and methodologies for a comprehensive understanding.
